title: Software Engineer & Scrum Master at Volvo Group Trucks Technology - Vehicle Automation.
summary: Biomedical Engineer with proven software engineer experience in the automotive sector. My areas of expertise are back-end solutions and mobile applications. Currently working as software developer for Volvo Autonomous Solutions (Java, Springboot, Docker, Azure DevOps, Kubernetes, Android, C++, ROS, Matlab). Interested in everything concerns technology, from electronics to informatics, from robotic to biomedical engineering.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Software developer and Scrum Master for the group Transport Mission and Route Management in Volvo Vehicle Automation. Development of microservices for managing, coordinating and dispatching autonomous vehicles and fleets to transport goods in an optimal and efficient way. Languages and tools utilized: Java 11, Spring Boot, Azure DevOps, Docker, Jenkins, Python3, Maven, REST, JPA, ActiveMQ, Javascript.

experience.title: Embedded Systems Consultant
experience.description: C++, ROS, Matlab/Simulink and Android developer for Volvo GTT/ATR.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Software for CAN BUS data analysis, Android and Matlab.
